messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What rule the Outer Gods have over the universe?
The Outer Gods rule the universe
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do humans usually suffer when meddling with these entities?
Humans usually end in madness or death
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the general attitude of Outer Gods towards humans?
They often try to break through cosmic walls or dimensions to wreak new destruction.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the messenger and soul controlling the Outer Gods?
Nyarlathotep
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the state of Azathoth, the daemon sultan and ruler of the cosmos?
Azathoth writhes mindlessly to the piping of a demon flute at the center of the universe.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the relationship between Yog-Sothoth and the mundane universe?
Yog-Sothoth is coterminous with all time and space, but locked somehow outside the mundane universe.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Azathoth's role in the universe?
daemon sultan and ruler of the cosmos
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Yog-Sothoth's connection to time and space?
coterminous with all time and space
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Azathoth be met by traveling through space?
theoretically might be met by traveling far enough through space
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the best-known Elder God?
Nodens
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the term Elder Gods sometimes referred to?
another race of gods, neutral to and possibly rivals of the Outer Gods
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the best-known Elder God?
Nodens
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the best-known Elder God?
Nodens
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is another name for a set of minor Outer Gods?
The Lesser Other Gods
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do humans typically worship Great Old Ones?
Entire clans or cults may secretly worship a Great Old One
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where do beings serving the Great Old Ones frequently inhabit?
The remote fastness of the Earth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the preferred deity for lone madmen?
the Outer Gods
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where are the beings serving the Great Old Ones often found?
the remote fastness of the Earth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do investigators most often encounter in their investigations?
worshipers and alien servants
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do the Great Old Ones appear?
themselves
